WA.name: Wales
WA._comment: Wales (GB-WLS) participated in Junior Eurovision in 2018 and 2019, and needed a two-letter code to be consistent with the other participants. This (user-assigned) alpha-2 code was introduced in 2018, but did not take into account the user-assignable space of ISO 3166. Since 'WA' is not an official ISO 3166 alpha-2 code, it should thus probably be moved to another code (Q_ or X_) at some point. XW would be the most logical choice, but that code is (at this moment) already in use. The alpha-3 code was made after the creation of this repository and does thus respect the user-assignable space.

XW.name: Rest of the World
XW._comment: Used to represent Rest of the World votes in Eurovision, starting from 2023.
